projects.name: TraceableLIVE Customer Service Admin Tool
projects.responsabilities: In this project, i used WPF to completley recreate an administration tool for the TraceableLIVE Customer Service team. Leveraging SQL Server and the TraveableLIVE API to Update and have visibility to customers accounts and pofile when client identify issues with their service. Along with this this tool allows for the Customer Service Team to view device data, device alarms, search for accounts and profiles based on keywords and send password reset emails.

projects.name: TraceableLIVE BackEnd
projects.technologies: .NET 4.6.2., .NET CORE 3.1, Azure Platform (Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus, App Service, Webjobs, Azure PipeLines), SQL Server 2016,

projects.name: TraceableLIVE FrontEnd - WEB
